tagline: India's leading food delivery and quick commerce platform
description: Swiggy is India's largest and most valued on-demand delivery platform. Founded in 2014, we deliver food from your favorite restaurants, groceries in minutes through Instamart, and anything you need through Genie. We partner with over 200,000 restaurants and stores across 500+ cities in India.

products.name: Swiggy Food Delivery
products.description: Partner with Swiggy to reach millions of hungry customers and grow your restaurant business
key_features: Access to 10+ million active users across India
Dedicated delivery fleet - no need to manage your own riders
Real-time order tracking and management dashboard
Marketing support and visibility through app placements
Data-driven insights and analytics to grow your business
Multiple cuisine tags and filters to help customers discover you
products.target_audience: Restaurants, cloud kitchens, cafes, bakeries, sweet shops

products.name: Swiggy Instamart
products.description: Partner with Instamart to sell groceries and daily essentials with 10-minute delivery
key_features: Instant visibility to local customers
Ultra-fast delivery in 10-30 minutes
No inventory management - we handle warehousing
Category leadership in groceries, fruits, vegetables, and daily needs
Smart demand prediction and inventory planning
products.target_audience: Grocery stores, supermarkets, kirana stores, specialty food sellers

products.name: Swiggy Genie
products.description: Offer pick-up and delivery services for any item within the city
key_features: Deliver anything - documents, packages, gifts, medicines
Intra-city delivery within hours
Real-time tracking for senders and receivers
Flexible pricing based on distance
Reliable delivery partners
products.target_audience: Small businesses, pharmacies, florists, gift shops, courier needs

products.name: Swiggy One
products.description: Premium membership program offering unlimited free delivery
key_features: Unlimited free delivery on food orders
Free delivery on Instamart
Exclusive discounts and offers
No surge pricing during peak hours

pricing.details: Swiggy charges a commission ranging from 15% to 25% per order depending on your restaurant type, location, and order value. No upfront fees or setup costs. You only pay when you get orders. Higher visibility restaurants may negotiate better rates.
Commission varies by category, typically 10-20% on product sales. Logistics and warehousing handled by Swiggy. Best for high-volume sellers. Revenue share model available for exclusive partnerships.
Charges start at Rs. 29 for short distances up to 2 km, scaling based on distance. Business accounts get volume discounts. No monthly subscription needed.
Promoted placements and banners available starting from Rs. 5,000 per campaign. Performance marketing with pay-per-click options. Custom packages for festivals and special events.

faq.question: What is Swiggy and how can it help my business?
faq.answer: Swiggy is India's leading food delivery and quick commerce platform. We help restaurants and stores reach millions of customers across 500+ cities. By partnering with us, you get access to our massive customer base, dedicated delivery fleet, technology platform, and marketing support - all without investing in your own delivery infrastructure.

faq.question: Who should partner with Swiggy?
faq.answer: Swiggy is perfect for restaurants of all sizes - from small local eateries to large chains, cloud kitchens, cafes, bakeries, sweet shops, and even grocery stores. If you serve food or sell daily essentials and want to reach more customers without managing deliveries yourself, Swiggy is for you. We work with everyone from single-outlet restaurants to multi-city chains.

faq.question: How much does it cost to partner with Swiggy?
faq.answer: For restaurants, Swiggy works on a commission model, typically 15% to 25% per order depending on factors like your location, restaurant type, and order volume. There are no upfront fees or setup costs. You only pay when you receive orders. For high-volume partners, we offer negotiated rates. It's a performance-based model, so you only pay for results.

faq.question: How long does onboarding take?
faq.answer: The onboarding process is quite fast. Once you submit your restaurant details and documents, verification typically takes 2-4 business days. After approval, we'll do a menu photoshoot, set up your online menu, and train your staff on our partner app. Most restaurants go live within 5-7 days from initial signup. For cloud kitchens ready to start, it can be even faster.

faq.question: Do I need to manage delivery myself?
faq.answer: Not at all. That's the beauty of partnering with Swiggy. We have our own fleet of delivery partners who handle all deliveries. You just need to prepare the food and pack it well. Our delivery executives pick it up and deliver to customers. You get to focus completely on cooking great food, while we handle the entire delivery logistics.

faq.question: What documents do I need to get started?
faq.answer: You'll need your FSSAI license, GST registration, PAN card, bank account details, and restaurant owner's ID proof. For newer establishments still getting FSSAI, we can work with your application acknowledgment in some cases. The process is straightforward and our partner onboarding team guides you through everything.

faq.question: How do I receive payments?
faq.answer: Swiggy settles payments weekly, directly to your bank account. You'll receive payment for all orders delivered in a week, minus our commission and any applicable taxes. We provide detailed invoices and transaction reports through your partner dashboard. Everything is transparent and trackable.

faq.question: Will Swiggy help with marketing my restaurant?
faq.answer: Yes, absolutely. All partner restaurants get organic visibility on our app based on ratings, cuisine, and location. Additionally, we run regular campaigns, offer promotional discounts, and feature restaurants in curated collections. You can also opt for paid promotions like banner ads and boosted listings to increase visibility further. Our marketing team works with partners during festivals and special occasions.

faq.question: How do I manage orders?
faq.answer: You'll use the Swiggy Partner app on your phone or tablet. When an order comes in, you get an instant notification. You can accept it, prepare the food, and mark it ready for pickup. The app shows you real-time order status, delivery tracking, earnings, and customer feedback. It's very intuitive and our team trains your staff on how to use it.

faq.question: What are the peak hours and how can I maximize orders?
faq.answer: Typical peak hours are lunch (12 PM - 2 PM) and dinner (7 PM - 10 PM), plus weekends. To maximize orders, maintain good ratings, keep your menu updated, ensure fast preparation times, and be available during peak hours. We also recommend running discounts during slow periods and participating in our promotional campaigns.

faq.question: Can I control my menu pricing on Swiggy?
faq.answer: Yes, you have full control over your menu and pricing. Many restaurants keep slightly higher prices on delivery platforms to account for commission and packaging costs, which is completely acceptable. You can update your menu, prices, and availability anytime through the partner app. We recommend pricing strategically to remain competitive while maintaining profitability.

faq.question: What if I want to run my own discounts or offers?
faq.answer: You can absolutely run your own discounts. You set the discount percentage and duration, and you bear the cost of that discount. Swiggy also runs platform-level discounts where we share the discount cost with you. Discounts are a great way to attract new customers and boost orders during slow periods.

faq.question: How does Swiggy ensure food quality during delivery?
faq.answer: We train our delivery partners on proper food handling. We recommend using high-quality packaging that keeps food fresh and prevents spills. We also have strict delivery time targets to ensure food reaches customers hot and fresh. Customer ratings and feedback help us monitor quality, and we work with partners to continuously improve.

faq.question: What kind of support does Swiggy provide to partners?
faq.answer: We provide comprehensive support including a dedicated partner helpline, account managers for high-volume restaurants, regular training sessions, menu photography, operational guidance, and data insights to help you grow. Our partner app has in-built chat support for quick issue resolution during operations.

faq.question: Is Swiggy available in my city?
faq.answer: Swiggy operates in over 500 cities across India, from metros like Mumbai, Delhi, Bangalore to smaller tier-2 and tier-3 cities. If you're in an area we serve, we'd love to partner with you. You can check availability by entering your location during the signup process on our partner website.

faq.question: What makes Swiggy different from other delivery platforms?
faq.answer: Swiggy has the largest customer base in India with over 10 million active users. We offer the most reliable delivery network, best-in-class technology, strong brand trust, and comprehensive partner support. Our diverse offerings - Food, Instamart, and Genie - mean more customer touchpoints. We also invest heavily in partner success through marketing, training, and analytics.

faq.question: Can I partner with Swiggy if I'm just starting a cloud kitchen?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Cloud kitchens are a huge part of our partner ecosystem. In fact, Swiggy is one of the best platforms for cloud kitchens since you get immediate access to customers without needing a physical storefront. We've helped thousands of cloud kitchens grow into successful businesses. Our team provides extra support to new cloud kitchens with menu optimization and positioning.

use_cases.description: Traditional restaurants looking to add delivery channel
Quick service restaurant chains with multiple outlets
Supermarkets, kirana stores for Instamart partnership
Sweet shops, mithai stores, health food stores

company_info.funding: Series J funded, valued at $10.7 billion
